name: Flamingo Tours
overview: In Flamingo Tours you are the manager of a travel agency. With your starting money you have to reserve hotel rooms, buy buses, charter planes or hire some cruising ships. If you are successful over time, you can open more bureaus all over Germany. If you don’t have enough money you can go to the local bank for some credits. The game has 3 difficulty levels, and 4 players can play hot-seat together.
